# permit2-sdk

## Local Development

### Checkout the repo
- `git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/Uniswap/permit2-sdk.git`

### Install dependencies
- `yarn`

### Run Unit Tests
- `yarn test`

### Run Forge tests
- `yarn build`
- `yarn interop`
- `(cd permit2 && forge build)`
- `forge test`
